title: Transistor
notes: Native controller support. **Decky Plugin: Some tinkering required**. **2.0 Standalone: Some tinkering required**. VC 2010/2012 Redists, DirectX Jun 2010 Redist
description: An unconventional tactical action RPG in which after a powerful group called the Camerata cause measureless destruction through the ambiguous settlement of Cloudbank, Red, a famous singer in the city, goes on a journey along with her lover who is trapped inside the Transistor...
